message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the potential loss due to inflation.
I think you're being too greedy! I'm offering a 90-10 split in my favor, but it's a fair offer considering the inflation risk.
Considering the inflation risk, I propose an equal split of the money. This ensures both of us receive a fair share without risking more than necessary.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more considering my risk tolerance. This 80-20 split is a fair offer, considering the current market conditions.
